name: Duality (itch) (Seraphh01)
description:
I present to you a project in development stage about duality principle, and many of its aspects that exist arguably everywhere in this world, from up and down, to light and dark, to day and night, to slow and fast, to moral and immoral and many more.

The game is presented primarly in two opposite colors and since we are talking about the concept of duality, these colors may interchange at certain times. Also there are other twists and interesting mechanics that you will encounter. 

How to play:

  • Move with WASD or arrow keys
  • Jump with spacebar (hold the spacebar button down to jump higher).

The game currently has no sounds effect, my apologies.

Have fun! 

I highly request you to leave an honest opinion of your experience and constructive criticism for my game in the comments below!

Thank you for coming!
